mapper.update: update ClientDetails set resourceIds = #{resourceids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appSecret = #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `scope` = #{scope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grantTypes = #{granttypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, redirectUrl = #{redirecturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authorities = #{authorities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_token_validity = #{accessTokenValidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refresh_token_validity = #{refreshTokenValidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, additionalInformation = #{additionalinformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, autoApproveScopes = #{autoapprovescopes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where appId = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select appId, resourceIds, appSecret, `scope`, grantTypes, redirectUrl, authorities, access_token_validity, refresh_token_validity, additionalInformation, autoApproveScopes from ClientDetails where appId = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
